seo.title: AUS/NZ Marine Detail Map g2 Update Card | Garmin

defaultImage.altTag: Australia and New Zealand Marine Detail Map g3

quickLinks.content:
Choosing a Map Format

Update Your Maps Report a Map Error

overviewTab.title: Overview
overviewTab.content:
This preprogrammed update card for your chartplotter gives you detailed electronic nautical charts that provide a smooth data transition between zoom levels. Data includes navaids, port plans, depth contours, fishing contours, spot soundings and more. Sharp, colorful graphics let you see every cartographic contour and feature, with a minimum of panning and zooming to bring the chart data into focus.

This package contains map data and a software update for your device. You must perform the software update on your device before this map will work. The card must remain in the device to view updated maps.

  • Provides basic chart navigation with 2-D or 3-D Over the Bow View map perspective.
  • Includes tides, currents, marine points of interest (POIs) and IALA symbols.
  • Displays port plans, fishing contours and standardized depth contours.

requirementsTab.title: Requirements
requirementsTab.content:
To update maps using this update card:

  1. Press the Power key to turn on the device. Do not turn off the device during the update process.
  2. After the Home screen appears, insert the card into the device. The Data Card screen appears.
  3. If software does not support reading the built-in map update from the card, the following message will appear: "Map Format Is Not Supported."
  4. Acknowledge this message.
  5. Select "Update Software" to update the device's software. The update process takes approximately 30 minutes to complete.

The device will now recognize the new map format.
